refnamediv.refname: Serializing SQL native classes as SOAP structures
refnamediv.refpurpose: Serializing SQL native classes as SOAP structures

refsect1.title: Example

itemizedlist.listitem: To test the service click on the Run link or point your browser to: http://[host]:[port]/services/services.vsmx

refsect1.para: This example demonstrates how to use SQL user defined types for SOAP datatype mappings.
It demontsrates the two approaches in using the user defined types for SOAP structure mappings :

itemizedlist.listitem: Attach a user defined type to a predefined schema instance (user defined type SO_S_30).
Generate the WSDL based on the user defined type's definition (user defined type SO_S_30_2).

refsect1.para: The example uses the implicit constructor for SQL native types (based on the default values).
